name: Wizard Tower Defence
description:
Station your wizards to zap the elemental motes in a slightly different take on the normal tower defence formula. Combine wizards into towers, choosing their traits and attack styles for the best defence you can mount.

Between battles spend your gems to improve the wizards of your Order and recruit new ones. Follow the antics of the archmaster and her apprentice through a campaign of scenarios, and last as long as you can on challenging endless modes.

Release Status

I've done all I plan to on the game and it should be reliably playable, but the current release is called 'beta' in case there is anything left to fix.

Requirements etc.

Should run on a fairly modest (modern) Windows machine. Requires mouse or other pointing device.

Might run on OSX & Linux, but I haven't tested that. I may add those labels if anyone tells me they work.
